wow stupid comments from stupid ppl... for those of you who cant tell a cpu from a dvd burner... the subs are NOT i repeat NOT hardcoded... watch on VLC. go to open file, and direct it to open the movie... then after u click open and the video is running u go to the VIDEO tab.... then move down to subtitles.... and disable... now if u still cant figure it out this is what u need to do... turn off pc. unplug the tower, grab some gasoline or any other flammable liquid. douse the tower with it, grab a match and light it. after the fire goes out stomp on the box, then collect the pieces and put them in a garbage bag, and toss the whole lot into the dumpster because u have place anywhere near anything technological... any questions? ;) and to the uploader ty for this man nice job A\V 10 M\8.5 good kiddie flick.
